PATIENT_ID: TEST_TBI_EDGE_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 03:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 03:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 19-year-old male, motorcycle crash.
Suspected traumatic brain injury.
BP 85/50, HR 135, GCS 7.
Patient intubated in field. Cardiopulmonary resuscitation adequate.
GCS assessed after adequate cardiopulmonary resuscitation: GCS 7.
Neurosurgery consulted at 03:15.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 03:30:00
GCS remains 7 after resuscitation. CT head ordered urgently.
Neurosurgery notified, Dr. Smith paged at 03:15.
Time of contact: 03:15. Neurosurgery responded at 03:28.

[CONSULT_NOTE] 2026-01-21 03:28:00
Neurosurgery evaluation. Patient with GCS 7 after resuscitation.
CT head shows epidural hematoma. Recommend emergent craniotomy.
Neurosurgery arrived at bedside at 03:28.

[OPERATIVE_NOTE] 2026-01-21 04:00:00
Emergent craniotomy for evacuation of epidural hematoma.
Patient taken to OR for definitive neurosurgical intervention.
